content: simple shawl by jane at hedgerow yarns materials 1 x 400m skein 4 ply/fingering weight sock yarn i used skein queen oasis grande 4 ply 50% silk/50% camel - 400m 100g 3 75mm or 4mm 80-100cms long circular needle - or the needle size to give the desired drape of your chosen yarn the finished shawl should have a fairly loose drapey texture abbreviations used k knit kfb knit into the front and then the back of the same stitch yo yarn over k2tog knit 2 stitches together method cast on 3 stitches row 1 - kfb k1 this will become your centre stitch kfb 5 stitches **you may wish to mark the centre stitch at this point with either a removable stitch marker a small safety pin or by placing a stitch marker either side of the stitch and slipping the markers across on every row ** row 2 - kfb knit to the centre stitch yo k1 the centre stitch yo knit to the last stitch kfb row 3 - kfb knit to the last stitch kfb row 4 kfb knit to the last stitch kfb continue to repeat row 2 3 & 4 until you have approximately 305 stitches on your needles or until about 25g of yarn remains however if you are not adding the optional eyelet section just carry on repeating row 2 3 &4 until you are happy with the size leaving enough yarn for the picot bind off hedgerow yarns © all rights reserved 2015 simple shawl by jane at hedgerow yarns eyelet section optional row 1 - kfb k1 *yo k2 decrease* repeat *-* until centre stitch yo k1 centre stitch yo k2tog until last 2sts k1 kfb row 2 & 3 - kfb knit all stitches until the last stitch kfb row 4 - kfb knit to centre stitch yo k1 centre stitch yo knit to the last stitch kfb row 5 & 6 - kfb knit all stitches until the last stitch kfb row 7 - repeat row 1 of the eyelet section row 8 & 9 - repeat row 2 & 3 row 10 kfb knit to last stitch kfb picot bind off step 1 - cast off 3 stitches slip the remaining stitch back onto the left hand needle step 2 - cast on 2 stitches cast off 5 stitches i always purl the first stitch of the 5 stitch cast off slip the remaining stitch back onto the left hand needle continue to repeat step 2 until the last stitch fasten_off block and weave in ends hedgerow yarns © all rights reserved 2015
